This method will query the VSL for the meta data of the table and colums and will use the supplied BSDFields to build the key for this query

getNewBusinessObjectRow

public versata.vfc.VSRow getNewBusinessObjectRow(java.lang.String boName)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a new row in a business object. The method creates a dummy query, which can produce a new result set, which can insert data into the business object.
Parameters:
boName - The name of the business object
Returns:
a new business row for this business object

insertBlockData

public void insertBlockData(java.lang.String boName,
                            java.util.Enumeration rows)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
OPTIMIZATION: Bulk entry of rows to same BO Inserts a block of new row sof data into a business object. After the insert, the values of all columns of the inserted row will be read back. The method will then update the Fields hashtable.
Parameters:
boName - Name of the business object
rows - The Enumeration that contains a Hashtable of all BSDFields (rows) for 1 update
Returns:
void don't return results

insertData

public java.util.Hashtable insertData(java.lang.String boName,
                                      java.util.Hashtable Fields)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Inserts a new row of data into a business object. After the insert, the values of all columns of the inserted row will be read back. The method will then update the Fields hashtable.
Parameters:
boName - Name of the business object
Fields - The hashtable that contains all the BSDFields
Returns:
The updated hashtable, will contain all row fields

setRowValues

public void setRowValues(versata.vfc.VSRow bo,
                         java.util.Hashtable Fields)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Set column values for a row of a business object Note that columns that have not been specified (null) in the BSDField's, will be set to their original value.
Parameters:
bo - The business object data row
Fields - All data fields, nicely packed in BSDFields
